FuncDef: This command displays diameter peer policy information and diameter peer information and statistics. For the diameter proxy, the incoming peer can be specified with an IP address and port number.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the diameter peer policy name, up to 32 characters.
Specifies the diameter peer name, up to 32 characters.
Specifies the IP address of the incoming peer (client side) of a diameter proxy.
Specifies the TCP port number of the incoming peer (client side) of a diameter proxy.
Displays the diameter peer statistics with details per diameter application, per message type, and per direction (rx/ tx).
